title: App is not working properly due libSkiaSharp.so is not included in lib/armeabi folder of android apk
body:
### Description

I've written an app using FFImageLoading's SVG & Xamarin forms. It uses SkiaSharp behind the sense.
In the result apk, libSkiaSharp.so is included in x86 but not included in armeabi! So app works properly on emulators, but not physical devices )-:

### Code

https://github.com/ysmoradi/XamarinFormsPrismSvgSample

### Expected Behavior

App should work fine on android devices as like as iOS devices/emulators & android emulators.

### Actual Behavior

App doesn't work on physical android devices only and you see no image.
To see the DllNotFoundException of libSkiaSharp.so, simply put a breakpoint at https://github.com/ysmoradi/XamarinFormsPrismSvgSample/blob/master/XamarinFormsPrismSvgSample/XamarinFormsPrismSvgSample/App.xaml.cs#L64

### Basic Information

- Version with issue:  1.60.0
- Last known good version:  )-:
- IDE:  Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - Android: 8.1
- Target Devices:
  -   All physcial android devices above 4.4
